source.d71b483e:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.103553a2:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,15))
plt.subplot(421)
df.groupby('Player')['Liga_Goals'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('Liga_Goals')
plt.subplot(422)
df.groupby('Player')['Liga_Asts'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('Liga_Asts')
plt.subplot(423)
df.groupby('Player')['Liga_Aps'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('Liga_Aps')
plt.subplot(424)
df.groupby('Player')['Liga_Mins'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('Liga_Mins')
plt.subplot(425)
df.groupby('Player')['CL_Goals'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('CL_Goals')
plt.subplot(426)
df.groupby('Player')['CL_Asts'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('CL_Asts')
plt.subplot(427)
df.groupby('Player')['CL_Aps'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('CL_Aps')
plt.subplot(428)
df.groupby('Player')['CL_Mins'].sum().plot.bar()
plt.title('CL_Mins')
plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=1)
plt.subplots_adjust(wspace=1)
source.55028024:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,20))
plt.subplot(441)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Liga_Goals',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Liga_Goals', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(442)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Liga_Asts',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Liga_Asts', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(443)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Liga_Aps',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Liga_Aps', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(444)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Liga_Mins',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Liga_Mins', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(445)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='CL_Goals',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('CL_Goals', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(446)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='CL_Asts',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('CL_Asts', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(447)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='CL_Aps',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('CL_Ap', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(448)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='CL_Mins',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('CL_Mins', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(449)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/Liga_Goals',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/Liga_Goals', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,10)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/Liga_Asts',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/Liga_Asts', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,11)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/Liga_Aps',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/Liga_Aps', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,12)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/CL_Goals',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/CL_Goals', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,13)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/CL_Asts',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/CL_Asts', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,14)
sns.barplot(data=df,x='Season',y='Mins/CL_Aps',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('Mins/CL_Aps', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,15)
sns.lineplot(data=df,x='Season',y='lg_rank',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('lg_rank', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplot(4,4,16)
sns.lineplot(data=df,x='Season',y='cl_rank',hue='Player',palette={'Messi':'royalblue','Ronaldo':'tomato'})
plt.title('cl_rank', size=10)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)

plt.subplots_adjust(wspace=0.4, hspace=0.6)
plt.show()
source.0e037bf5:
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 12))
plt.legend(fontsize=10)
plt.tick_params(labelsize=10)
ax=sns.scatterplot(y=df['Liga_Asts'],x=df['Liga_Goals'],hue=df['Player'],size=df['lg_rank'],data=df,sizes=(200,50))
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
ax.legend(loc='upper left',bbox_to_anchor=(1,1))

plt.xticks(rotation=90)
ax.legend(loc='upper left',bbox_to_anchor=(1,1))
source.7aaf0d4c:
* I also add the columns of rank of FC Barcelona and Real Madrid
* Data from
https://betchannel-football.com/ligaespanola/ranked/
https://betchannel-football.com/cl/ranked/
source.f0b8eecc:
* Messi has stronger correlation in performance between Liga and CL compared to Ronaldo.
* For example, Messi's corrlation between Liga Goal and CL Goal is 0.6, correlation between Liga Goal and CL assist is 0.8 etc..On the other hand, Lonaldo's correlation between Liga Goal and CL Goal is -0.3, correlation between Laga Goal and CL assist is 0.1 etc..
* It means that Messi is playing Liga and CL at the same engine and gear, but Ronaldo may be playing Liga and CL at the different engine and gear.
source.32817852: * I add the columns which show Mins per activities,Goals,Assists and Appearances.
source.aa59b186:
* Ronaldo has strong correlation in Goal, Assist and Apprearance in Liga, '0.9'. And it contributes to the rank of Real Madrid in Liga. On the other hand, in CL, correlation in activities is negative, but it contributes to the rank of Real Madrid in CL strongly.
* Messi has strong correlation in Goal and Assist in CL, '0.8'. And it contributes to the rank of FC Barcelona in CL. On the other hand, in Liga, correlation between assist and appearance is also so strong, but  it does not contribute to the rank of FC Barcelona in Liga so much.
source.5a0c6118: * In 2009 to 2018, Messi is more active in Liga than Ronalldo,and Ronaldo is more active in CL than Messi.
source.55d583cc: 2) Visualization to compare Messi and Ronaldo by season
source.73d2800c: 1) Visualization to compare Messi and Ronaldo in Total Goals, Assitants and Appearances
source.9cc90026:
* Correlation between Messi's Goal and Barsa's rank is 0.2(Negative) in Liga,and -0.5(Strong Positive) in CL.
* Correlation between Ronaldo's Goal and Real's rank is -0.3(Positive) in Liga,and -0.8(Strong Positive) in CL.
* Botn Goals in CL contribute to Clubs' rank in CL.
source.9c660c13: 3) Visualization to compare Messi and Ronaldo by correlation between features
